For what it's worth, the missing file error is coming out of 
deps/eleveldb/c\\_src/leveldb/Makefile. Line 19 in that does indeed reference a 
file that doesn't exist locally for me:

# this file is generated by build\\_detect\\_platform to set build flags
include build\\_config.mk
---
Jeremiah Peschka - Founder, Brent Ozar PLF, LLC
Microsoft SQL Server MVP
